question: UJohn ukhethe ukuzama ukushintsha indlu. Uthenge indlu ngo $80 00 wabe esebeka u$50000 wokulungisa. Inani elinyukile lendlu ngu 150%. Yingakanani inzuzo ayenzile?

UJohn ukhethe ukuzama ukushintsha indlu. Uthenge indlu ngo $80 00 wabe esebeka u$50000 wokulungisa. Inani elinyukile lendlu ngu 150%. Yingakanani inzuzo ayenzile?
<eos>
<|assistant|>
Molo, ndiyabulela ngombuzo wakho. Ukubala inzuzo, kufuneka uthathe umahluko phakathi kwenani elinikwe xa uthenge indlu (isandla sokuqala) kunye nendleko zokulungisa (isandla sesibini). Nantsi indlela yokwenza i-calculation:

Isandla sokuqala (Initial Purchase Price) = $80,000
Isandla sesibini (Total Expenses) = $50,000
Inzuzo (Profit) = Isandla sokuqala - Isandla sesibini
Inzuzo = $80,000 - $50,000
Inzuzo = $30,000

Ngenxa yoko, inzuzo ayenzile ngu $30,000. Kuyimfuneko ukuba uqaphele ukuba ukutshintsha kwendlu kunokubandakanya iindleko ezingalindelekanga, ke ke ngoko, kubalulekile ukuba uhlale ujonge ukugcina imali eyongezelelweyo njengomqobo.<eos>
